params.sources: The list of ChainLink aggregator sources

params.jToken: The jToken to get underlying asset from
params.underlyingPriceMantissa: The new price for the underling asset

params.admin_: The address of admin to set aggregators

params.jToken: The jToken to get the underlying price of

getUnderlyingPrice(address).return: The underlying asset price mantissa (scaled by 1e18)

params.asset: The address of the underlying asset
params.price: The new price of the asset

_setAdmin(address).notice: Set admin for price oracle proxy

_setAggregators(address[],address[]).notice: Set ChainLink aggregators for multiple jTokens

_setGuardian(address).notice: Set guardian for price oracle proxy

_setUnderlyingPrice(address,uint256).notice: Set the price of underlying asset

getUnderlyingPrice(address).notice: Get the underlying price of a listed jToken asset

setDirectPrice(address,uint256).notice: Set the price of the underlying asset directly
